title: Highest earning eSports countries in 2018 , by prize winnings
yAxis: Prize money in million U.S. dollars
summary: This bar chart has 10 columns on the x axis representing Country, and Prize money in million U.S. dollars in each Country on the y axis.
The Prize money in million U.S. dollars is highest at Country United States and lowest at Country Germany.
The difference of Prize money in million U.S. dollars between the highest and lowest Country is 23.91.
